lines.i: Information on whether a home birth was planned for the infant.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.26"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:394)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:396)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:395)/@code="73765-0" Planned to delivery at home (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records whether the parents planned to deliver at home.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:397)
A Boolean value to indicate whether the mother planned to deliver at home.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:394)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:396)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:395)/@code="73765-0" Planned to delivery at home (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
A code value that indicates the nature of the observation - it records whether the parents planned to deliver at home.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL (CONF:397)
A Boolean value to indicate whether the mother planned to deliver at home.
